changeSet.author: ew256
changeSet.sql: create schema locations
create schema schedule
create schema time_desc;
create schema data

changeSet.author: ew256
changeSet.sql: create sequence locations.rooms_room_id_seq
create sequence locations.schemes_scheme_id_seq
create sequence schedule.all_data_data_id_seq
create sequence schedule.cycle_events_event_id_seq
create sequence schedule.engages_engage_id_seq
create sequence time_desc.pairs_pair_id_seq
create sequence data.groups_group_id_seq
create sequence schedule.engage_types_engage_type_id_seq
create sequence schedule.cycle_cycles_id_seq
create sequence schedule.transfer_transfers_id_seq
create sequence locations.room_types_room_type_id_seq

changeSet.author: ew256
changeSet.sql: create table schedule.cycle_events ( id integer not null constraint cycle_events_pkey primary key, week_type varchar(10), group_id varchar(50), seq_num integer )
create unique index cycle_events_id_uindex on schedule.cycle_events (id)
create table locations.schemes ( id integer not null constraint schemes_pkey primary key, name varchar(50), file_name varchar(100), floor integer, building integer )
create unique index schemes_id_uindex on locations.schemes (id)
create table time_desc.pairs ( id integer not null constraint pairs_pkey primary key, name varchar(100), time_from varchar(100), time_to varchar(100) )
create unique index pairs_id_uindex on time_desc.pairs (id)
create table data.edu_groups ( id integer not null constraint edu_groups_pkey primary key, name varchar(30) )
create unique index edu_groups_id_uindex on data.edu_groups (id)
create table schedule.engage_type ( id integer not null constraint engagetype_pkey primary key, engage_type_id integer, description varchar(100) )
create unique index engagetype_id_uindex on schedule.engage_type (id)
create unique index engagetype_engage_type_id_uindex on schedule.engage_type (engage_type_id)
create table locations.room_type ( id integer not null, name varchar(100) )
create unique index room_type_id_uindex on locations.room_type (id)

create table locations.rooms ( id integer not null constraint rooms_pkey primary key, name varchar(100), capacity integer, type varchar(50), scheme_id integer constraint rooms_schemes_id_fk references locations.schemes, scheme_mapping integer, room_type_id integer constraint rooms_room_type_id_fk1 references locations.room_type (id) )

create table schedule.all_data ( date date not null, pair_id integer constraint all_data_pair_id_fkey references time_desc.pairs, engaged_by_id integer constraint all_data_engaged_id_fkey references data.edu_groups, week_type integer not null, room_id integer constraint all_data_room_id_fkey references locations.rooms, id integer not null constraint all_data_pk primary key, week_num integer not null, engage_type_id integer constraint all_data_engage_type_engage_type_id_fk references schedule.engage_type (engage_type_id), week_day integer )
create unique index all_data_id_uindex on schedule.all_data (id)

create table schedule.engages ( id integer not null constraint engagings_pkey primary key, engaged_by_id integer constraint engages_edu_groups_id_fk references data.edu_groups, engage_type_id integer constraint engages_engage_type_engage_type_id_fk references schedule.engage_type (engage_type_id), transferred_from_all_data_id integer constraint engages_all_data_id_fk references schedule.all_data, teacher_name varchar(100), insert_date timestamp not null, all_data_id integer not null constraint engages_all_data_id_fk_2 references schedule.all_data )
create unique index engagings_id_uindex on schedule.engages (id)
create unique index rooms_id_uindex on locations.rooms (id)

create table schedule.cycles ( id integer not null constraint cycles_pkey primary key, all_data_id integer not null constraint cycles_all_data_id_fk references schedule.all_data, seq_num integer not null, cycle_id varchar(100) not null )
create unique index cycles_id_uindex on schedule.cycles (id)

create table schedule.transfers ( id integer not null constraint transfers_pkey primary key, from_all_date_id integer not null constraint transfers_all_data_id_fk references schedule.all_data, seq_num integer not null, cycle_id varchar(100) not null, to_all_date_id integer not null constraint transfers_all_data_id_fk_2 references schedule.all_data )
create unique index transfers_id_uindex on schedule.transfers (id)
